room_title: Escape room "Tony's Bistro" by Escape Room Novi in Detroit
room_address: 44325 W 12 Mile Ste H175 Novi, MI 48377
room_description: Notorious Hit Man Rocco Calzone was supposed to get his payoff at Tony's. When he got there, he found an ambush waiting and the Feds got the best of him. Somebody spilled the beans on Tony and the mob knows the half million is still in the restaurant. They'll be coming back for it soon. Don't be there when they arrive.
